anime.name: Kyou kara Ore wa!!
anime.synopsis: This anime is about two students that tired of being normal and unpopular at their old schools, after they both transfer to a new one they try to change that deciding to become delinquents. After a rough start they become friends and the righteous Itou with the cheater Takashi start their (dis)adventures trying to survive the other delinquents from both their own and other schools.
